content: S-MD PPH #3 Self-drilling pan screws Self-drilling pan head screw (zinc-plated) for fastening sheet metal to steel substructures ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast and robust drill tip Galvanized zinc coating for indoor use Screws driven in quickly due to optimized drill point geometry Applications Fastening sheet metal on steel substructures – maximum combined thickness 0.175 inch ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Phillips pan head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Phillips pan head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2099042 - Self-drill screw S-MD10-16x5/8 PPH3 - Package Size 7500 pc - 2099043 - Self-drill screw S-MD10-16x3/4 PPH3 - Package Size 6500 pc - 2415109 - Self-drill screw S_MD 10-16x5/8 PPH3 CRC - Package Size 7500 pc
